DialogComponent.Name: InputFile
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the name of the input file here

DialogComponent.Name: OutputFile
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the name of the output file here

DialogComponent.Name: modelType
DialogComponent.Description: What model type would you like to use?

DialogComponent.Name: p1
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the value at which membership probability rises above 0 here.
DialogComponent.LabelText: Value at which MP rises above 0:

DialogComponent.Name: p2
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the value at which membership probability rises to 1 here.
DialogComponent.LabelText: Value at which MP rises to 1:

DialogComponent.Name: p3
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the value at which membership probability falls below 1 here.
DialogComponent.LabelText: Value at which MP falls below 1:

DialogComponent.Name: p4
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the value at which membership probability falls to 0 here.
DialogComponent.LabelText: Value at which MP falls to 0:
